param.name: env.MACHINE
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Specific machine to build the package for' label='Machine' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
mkdir -p build/conf echo 'DISTRO = "asteroid" PACKAGE_CLASSES = "package_ipk" SSTATE_MIRRORS ?= "file://.* %system.sstate.server.address%/%env.MACHINE%/sstate-cache/PATH;downloadfilename=PATH"' >> build/conf/local.conf echo 'BBPATH = "${TOPDIR}" SRCDIR = "${@os.path.abspath(os.path.join("${TOPDIR}", "../src/"))}"
BBLAYERS = " \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-qt5 \ ${SRCDIR}/oe-core/meta \ ${SRCDIR}/%system.recipeLayer% \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-oe \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-multimedia \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-gnome \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-networking \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-smartphone/meta-android \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-python \ ${SRCDIR}/meta-openembedded/meta-filesystems \ ' > build/conf/bblayers.conf
# Add the relevant hybris for real machine dependence if [ $MACHINE != "qemux86" ]; then echo ' ${SRCDIR}/meta-%env.MACHINE%-hybris \ ' >> build/conf/bblayers.conf fi
echo ' "' >> build/conf/bblayers.conf
# Try to initialize OE environment source ./src/oe-core/oe-init-build-env
